Package com.cloudera.oryx.common.lang

Contains utility code related to the JVM, classes, logging and other concerns closely related to the core language.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoLock
    Makes a Lock into an AutoCloseable for use with try-with-resources: {@code Lock lock = ...; ...
    AutoReadWriteLock
    Makes a ReadWriteLock that can return AutoLocks and exposes AutoReadWriteLock.autoReadLock() and AutoReadWriteLock.autoWriteLock() like AutoLock.autoLock().
    ClassUtils
    Class-related utility methods.
    JVMUtils
    JVM-related utility methods.
    LangUtils
    Utilities that are generic to the Java language.
    LoggingCallable<V>
    A Callable that logs errors thrown from LoggingCallable.call().
    LoggingRunnable
    A Runnable that logs errors thrown from LoggingRunnable.run().
    LoggingVoidCallable
    A Callable that logs errors thrown from LoggingVoidCallable.call().

Package com.cloudera.oryx.common.lang Description

Contains utility code related to the JVM, classes, logging and other concerns closely related to the core language.
